activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10980
activity.text: @rithviknishad There is also an issue with the camera mirror effect. When I open my camera and raise my right hand, it appears on the left. Should I create a new issue for this?

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10980
activity.text: @ARH-MNAJS, That’s a valid point! However, forcing users to select an image with a specific aspect ratio might not be the best UX. Let’s wait for the mentor’s input on this
